thread.title: David Holland Customer
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by David Holland Customer

author: David Holland Customer
title: David Holland Customer
text: Arrived within the time slot allocated to me,a very proffesional fitter and very friendly,explaind the fitting process to me even to explaining the Torque needed in refitting the wheels,the Fitter ( Ryan ) advised me on the best way to look after my tyres making sure the correct tyre pressure is maintained,I was very impressed with the tidiness of the fitters van and the amount of up to date equipment installed in the vehicle which made the speed of my fitting of 2 tyres incredibly fast,i felt as though I had received exceedingly good value for money,a great service !!
